00020 
00032 QwtDoubleRect QwtData::boundingRect() const
00033 {
00034     const size_t sz = size();
00035 
00036     if ( sz <= 0 )
00037         return QwtDoubleRect(1.0, 1.0, -2.0, -2.0); // invalid
00038 
00039     double minX, maxX, minY, maxY;
00040     minX = maxX = x(0);
00041     minY = maxY = y(0);
00042 
00043     for ( size_t i = 1; i < sz; i++ )
00044     {
00045         const double xv = x(i);
00046         if ( xv < minX )
00047             minX = xv;
00048         if ( xv > maxX )
00049             maxX = xv;
00050 
00051         const double yv = y(i);
00052         if ( yv < minY )
00053             minY = yv;
00054         if ( yv > maxY )
00055             maxY = yv;
00056     }
00057     return QwtDoubleRect(minX, minY, maxX - minX, maxY - minY);
00058 }

00114 QwtArrayData::QwtArrayData(
00115         const QwtArray<double> &x, const QwtArray<double> &y): 
00116     d_x(x), 
00117     d_y(y)
00118 {
00119 }
00120 
00126 QwtArrayData::QwtArrayData(const double *x, const double *y, size_t size)
00127 {
00128 #if QT_VERSION >= 0x040000
00129     d_x.resize(size);
00130     qMemCopy(d_x.data(), x, size * sizeof(double));
00131 
00132     d_y.resize(size);
00133     qMemCopy(d_y.data(), y, size * sizeof(double));
00134 #else
00135     d_x.detach();
00136     d_x.duplicate(x, size);
00137 
00138     d_y.detach();
00139     d_y.duplicate(y, size);
00140 #endif
00141 }
00142 
00144 QwtArrayData& QwtArrayData::operator=(const QwtArrayData &data)
00145 {
00146     if (this != &data)
00147     {
00148         d_x = data.d_x;
00149         d_y = data.d_y;
00150     }
00151     return *this;
00152 }

00154 size_t QwtArrayData::size() const 
00155 { 
00156     return qwtMin(d_x.size(), d_y.size());

00189 QwtDoubleRect QwtArrayData::boundingRect() const
00190 {
00191     const size_t sz = size();
00192 
00193     if ( sz <= 0 )
00194         return QwtDoubleRect(1.0, 1.0, -2.0, -2.0); // invalid
00195 
00196     double minX, maxX, minY, maxY;
00197     QwtArray<double>::ConstIterator xIt = d_x.begin();
00198     QwtArray<double>::ConstIterator yIt = d_y.begin();
00199     QwtArray<double>::ConstIterator end = d_x.begin() + sz;
00200     minX = maxX = *xIt++;
00201     minY = maxY = *yIt++;
00202 
00203     while ( xIt < end )
00204     {
00205         const double xv = *xIt++;
00206         if ( xv < minX )
00207             minX = xv;
00208         if ( xv > maxX )
00209             maxX = xv;
00210 
00211         const double yv = *yIt++;
00212         if ( yv < minY )
00213             minY = yv;
00214         if ( yv > maxY )
00215             maxY = yv;
00216     }
00217     return QwtDoubleRect(minX, minY, maxX - minX, maxY - minY);
00218 }

00273 QwtDoubleRect QwtCPointerData::boundingRect() const
00274 {
00275     const size_t sz = size();
00276 
00277     if ( sz <= 0 )
00278         return QwtDoubleRect(1.0, 1.0, -2.0, -2.0); // invalid
00279 
00280     double minX, maxX, minY, maxY;
00281     const double *xIt = d_x;
00282     const double *yIt = d_y;
00283     const double *end = d_x + sz;
00284     minX = maxX = *xIt++;
00285     minY = maxY = *yIt++;
00286 
00287     while ( xIt < end )
00288     {
00289         const double xv = *xIt++;
00290         if ( xv < minX )
00291             minX = xv;
00292         if ( xv > maxX )
00293             maxX = xv;
00294 
00295         const double yv = *yIt++;
00296         if ( yv < minY )
00297             minY = yv;
00298         if ( yv > maxY )
00299             maxY = yv;
00300     }
00301     return QwtDoubleRect(minX, minY, maxX - minX, maxY - minY);
00302 }
